metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). This section was amended by 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 426, 527, and 538. Where these Acts are not in conflict, they have been codified together. Where a conflict exists between chs. 527 and 538, Acts ch. 527, which was last enacted by the General Assembly, prevails under KRS 446.250. .
